scripts.build:headerApp:externals: ng build --extra-webpack-config projects/headerApp/webpack.externals.js --prod --project headerApp --single-bundle --output-hashing none && node build-elements.js headerApp
scripts.build:footerApp:externals: ng build --extra-webpack-config projects/footerApp/webpack.externals.js --prod --project footerApp --single-bundle --output-hashing none && node build-elements.js footerApp
scripts.build:sideApp:externals: ng build --extra-webpack-config projects/sideApp/webpack.externals.js --prod --project sideApp --single-bundle --output-hashing none && node build-elements.js sideApp
scripts.build:mainApp:externals: ng build --extra-webpack-config projects/mainApp/webpack.externals.js --prod --project mainApp --single-bundle --output-hashing none && node build-elements.js mainApp
scripts.build:subApp:externals: ng build --extra-webpack-config projects/subApp/webpack.externals.js --prod --project subApp --single-bundle --output-hashing none && node build-elements.js subApp
